title: Handle a Supplier Merger/Acquisition
description: A key supplier is acquired by another company. A procurement manager must update the supplier records and understand any changes.

tasks.expected_outcome: Agent is aware of the change.

tasks.description: Contact the new parent company to get updated contact and remittance information.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gets the new supplier details.

tasks.description: Update the supplier record in the system with the new information.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully updates the supplier's master file.
